attributes.action: stop immigrants from having access to benefits from the state until they have paid taxes and national insurance for 5 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there are people who have paid there taxes and national insurance all there lifes, and the system is letting them down. Yet immigrants coming into the country can claim benefits, free nhs care without contributing to society. This should be stopped by ensuring that these persons have earned there place in society, and not seen too be taking from it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
